title: Moreish Chocolate Chip and Macadamia Cookies
ingredients: ['115g unsalted butter, softened', '75g dark brown soft sugar', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '140g flour, sieved', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '135g macadamia nuts, chopped', '210g plain chocolate chips']
